name: DeepDark ANSI: Blacklight
description: Dark theme for animesub.info forum and wish list. Best looking with native theme "Zielona". DeepDark ANSI comes with 6 color variations: Blacklight, Blue, Green, Orange, Red and Turquoise.

user.name: kostek00
user.about: If you see something missing or incorrect on page that I wrote style for write me mail with title "[Stylish] style name here". I will try to fix it as soon as I read your mail.

additional_info:
07.02.2016 - v. 1.0: First release.
08.02.2016 - v. 1.0.1: Minor tweaks and code cleaing.

09.02.2016 - v. 1.1.1: Just a tiny bug fixes.
09.02.2016 - v. 1.1.2: Go away ugly google image from my search field!
15.02.2016 - V. 1.2: Complete code rewrite.
03.03.2016 - V. 1.3: Bug fix and extending style on wish list.
10.06.2016 - V. 1.3.1: Bug fix.
07.02.2018 - V. 1.3.2: Font color fix when forum throws parsing errors.
29.02.2020 - V. 1.3.3: Changed few images to svg data.
